submission.emailSummary:
### üè¢ Property Overview
The submission centers on a modern, high-rise condominium located at 24-16 Queens Plaza South, Long Island City, NY. Built in 2019, this 22-story, fire-resistive structure combines residential apartments with a mercantile (merc) component, specifically a bank tenant. The property spans 110,553 sq ft and is valued at a replacement cost basis, reflecting a robust, contemporary asset profile in a dense urban environment. The insured's mailing address is 260 Madison Avenue, 12th Floor, New York, NY 10016.

### üí∞ Coverage Structure & Limits
- Building: $50,905,000
- BPP: $100,000
- BI/EE: $1,610,000
- TIV: $52,615,000
- Ordinance or Law: Full A, 10% B&C
- Valuation: Replacement Cost (except ALS on BI)

### üõ°Ô∏è Deductibles & Special Terms
- EQ: $50,000 per occurrence
- Flood: $100,000 per occurrence
- Sewer Backup: $50,000
- Water Damage: $50,000
- AOP: $25,000 per occurrence

### üìÑ Loss History
- 3/12/2020‚Äì12/2021: Accidental plumbing discharge, $230,003
- 3/12/2021‚Äì3/12/2022: Accidental plumbing discharge, $945,933

### üè¶ Occupancy & Tenant Profile
- Residential apartments (primary use)
- Mercantile tenant: bank
- Bank occupancy may enhance risk profile but requires confirmation of tenant risk controls
